parameters.name: EnablePage
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to query by page. Optional values:

*   **true**: Enable pagination query
*   **false**: Pagination query is disabled

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. The value must be greater than 0. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 20.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the disk.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description:
The resource group ID.

For more information about resource groups, see [Resource groups](https://help.aliyun.com/document_detail/94475.htm?spm=a2c4g.11186623.0.0.29e15d7akXhpuu).

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the CLB instance. Valid values:

*   **Available**: Normal
*   **Not Available**: Unavailable
*   **Executing**: Executing
*   **Deleting**: The node is being deleted.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description:
The tag information.

You can specify up to 20 tags.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
Lingjun Subnet Usage Type; optional; optional. Valid values:

*   **If you do not set this field for a common type**
*   **OOB** :OOB type
*   **LB**: LB type

parameters.name: VpdId
parameters.description: The ID of the Lingjun CIDR block.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description: The zone ID of the disk.
